function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Positive association between latitude and number of COVID-19 cases","Impact":"Increase in cases at higher latitudes","Mitigation":"Implement strict public health measures at higher latitudes","Technologies":"Data analysis and modeling for predicting case numbers","People":"Population at higher latitudes","Owner":"Public health authorities"},{"Description":"Increase in COVID-19 cases per million inhabitants with increase in absolute latitude","Impact":"Higher case numbers in regions with higher latitudes","Mitigation":"Implementation of targeted public health policies and actions in high latitude regions","Technologies":"Data analysis and modeling for predicting case numbers","People":"Population in high latitude regions","Owner":"Public health authorities"},{"Description":"Possible boost in COVID-19 impact due to increasing temperatures and longer sunlight exposure during summer","Impact":"Potential boost in spread of COVID-19 during summer","Mitigation":"Implement measures to account for potential increase in spread during summer","Technologies":"Data analysis and modeling for predicting impact of temperature and sunlight on virus spread","People":"General population during summer","Owner":"Public health authorities"}]}
